poems.title: Cosmic Whispers
poems.excerpt: In the silence between heartbeats, stars whisper ancient secrets...

poems.title: Signal in the Void
poems.excerpt: I send messages to the cosmos, hoping somewhere you might hear...
content: I send messages to the cosmos,

poems.title: Stellar Love
poems.excerpt: Your love burns brighter than a thousand suns, illuminating the darkness...
content: Your love burns brighter than a thousand suns,
Illuminating the darkness of my soul,

poems.title: Empty Station
poems.excerpt: The silence echoes where your laughter used to fill these halls...
content: The silence echoes where your laughter
Used to fill these empty halls,

poems.title: For Those Who Listen
poems.excerpt: To you, unknown friend floating somewhere in the dark...

poems.title: Gravity of You
poems.excerpt: You were my North Star, my constant in the endless night...
content: My constant in the endless night,

poems.title: Last Transmission
poems.excerpt: If this message finds you among the stars, know that I remember...

author.name: Luca Vale
author.bio: He writes when the world falls silent. Luca Vale is a boy made of late nights and lost words.. a quiet soul who loves too deeply and leaves too softly. He writes not to be heard, but to remember. To keep the moments that broke him beautiful.

website.title: The Maroon Hour - Luca Vale
website.tagline: Where Luca Vale writes when the world falls silent.
website.description: Where late nights become love letters and heartbreak turns beautiful
